item.description:
Join us for a fun evening of Karaoke, a Potluck dinner, Play a game of pool, sit by the fire, watch a movie, and enjoy each other's company!

We have the Great Room and the Movie Room from 7:00 till Midnight!

We will ask everyone to bring a dish and charge a small amount to cover the cost of renting the room and other supplies such as paper goods.

Stay tuned for more information!

****We have invited the Temple Emunah Jewish Singles Group to join us at our party!!! Please RSVP as soon as possible!!!!
item.name: Let's have a Party!
